summary: This appears to be a confidential internal communication from the Federal Correctional Institution (FCI) Estill, reporting that Jeffrey Epstein was not granted bail and returned from court without incident. It is addressed to an unspecified recipient and marked as confidential.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the communication; reported as not being granted bail and returning from court without incident.

persons.name: Associate Warden (O)
persons.context: The sender of the message, identified by their title at FCI Estill.

connections.description: The Associate Warden is reporting on the status and transport of inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Bail Denial and Return to FCI Estill
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was not granted bail at a court proceeding and was returned to the Federal Correctional Institution in Estill, South Carolina, without incident.

locations.name: FCI Estill
locations.context: The federal correctional institution where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was denied bail on or around July 18, 2019.
Epstein was returned to FCI Estill without incident following the court appearance.
The communication is marked as confidential and originates from the Associate Warden at FCI Estill.
The document is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
